```{r}
#| results: asis
#| echo: false

linkify <- function(name, series, ...) {
  paste0(
    '<a href="\\gallery\\',
    stringr::str_remove(series, "^series-"),
    '\\">',
    name,
    '</a>'
  )
}

here::here("_galleries.csv") |>
  readr::read_csv(show_col_types = FALSE) |>
  dplyr::arrange(name) |> 
  purrr::pmap_chr(linkify) |> 
  stringr::str_c(collapse = ", ") |> 
  stringr::str_to_lower() |> 
  cat()
```
